card.name: Bane of Bala Ged
card.property: Whenever Bane of Bala Ged attacks, defending player exiles two permanents he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The continent of Bala Ged was ravaged by massive Eldrazi of Ulamog's lineage, its lush jungles and cascading rivers reduced to dust.

card.name: Blight Herder
card.property: When you cast Blight Herder, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Breaker of Armies
card.property: All creatures able to block Breaker of Armies do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are some who have lost everyone and everything. They actively seek out the Eldrazi, eager for the smallest measure of vengeance."—Munda, ambush leader

card.name: Conduit of Ruin
card.property: When you cast Conduit of Ruin, you may search your library for a colorless creature card with converted mana cost 7 or greater, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.

card.name: Deathless Behemoth
card.property: Vigilance Sacrifice two Eldrazi Scions: Return Deathless Behemoth from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Over and over it rose. Over and over we fell."—Ganda, Goma Fada deserter

card.name: Desolation Twin
card.property: When you cast Desolation Twin, create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With precise coordination and enough blood spilled, one can be driven off, even brought down. But two . . . that's a lot of blood."—Munda, ambush leader

card.name: Eldrazi Devastator
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how big your champion, theirs is bigger. No matter how great your numbers, theirs are greater. No matter how voracious your appetite, they are hungrier. That is why the Eldrazi will win."—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog

card.name: Endless One
card.property: Endless One enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It embodies all possible meanings of the word "infinite."

card.name: Gruesome Slaughter
card.property: Until end of turn, colorless creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Gideon arrived at Sea Gate too late to prevent the massacre, he still had enough time to lead its survivors to relative safety.

card.name: Kozilek's Channeler
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the dark places of our world, something horrible is growing. I fear our foes may be more numerous than we had imagined."—Nissa Revane

card.name: Oblivion Sower
card.property: When you cast Oblivion Sower, target opponent exiles the top four cards of his or her library, then you may put any number of land cards that player owns from exile onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eldrazi hunger without limit and consume without pause.

card.name: Ruin Processor
card.property: When you cast Ruin Processor, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eldrazi continue to sweep through the wastes, compounding destruction that already seemed absolute.

card.name: Scour from Existence
card.property: Exile target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our people and our very lands disappear as if they never were. We no longer fight for glory, or honor. We battle now for the right to exist."—General Tazri, allied commander

card.name: Titan's Presence
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Titan's Presence, reveal a colorless creature card from your hand. Exile target creature if its power is less than or equal to the revealed card's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dust and memory are all that remain in Ulamog's wake.

card.name: Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger
card.property: When you cast Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, exile two target permanents. Indestructible Whenever Ulamog attacks, defending player exiles the top twenty cards of his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A force as voracious as time itself.

card.name: Ulamog's Despoiler
card.property: As Ulamog's Despoiler enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, Ulamog's Despoiler enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Void Winnower
card.property: Your opponents can't cast spells with even converted mana costs. (Zero is even.) Your opponents can't block with creatures with even converted mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever seen a world fall to its knees? Watch, and learn."—Ob Nixilis

card.name: Angel of Renewal
card.property: Flying When Angel of Renewal enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No more fear. No more failure. No more death. No more!"

card.name: Angelic Gift
card.property: Enchant creature When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."

card.name: Cliffside Lookout
card.property: {4} {W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though losses run high among the scouts of the Stone Havens, they never flinch from their duty.

card.name: Courier Griffin
card.property: Flying When Courier Griffin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sea Gate has fallen. Survivors are on the move. Will send another griffin when we find refuge. Stay hidden. Stay safe."—Message from Tars Olan, kor world-gift

card.name: Emeria Shepherd
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that land is a Plains, you may return that nonland permanent card to the battlefield instead.

card.name: Encircling Fissure
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures target opponent controls. Awaken 2—{4}{W} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}, also put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unofficial motto of every expedition house is "ready for anything," a phrase whose significance has been amplified since the emergence of the Eldrazi.

card.name: Felidar Cub
card.property: Sacrifice Felidar Cub: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.

card.name: Felidar Sovereign
card.property: Vigilance, lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It surveys the withering landscape, waiting for a victory only it can see.

card.name: Fortified Rampart
card.property: Defender

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The refuge's defenses allow new recruits to see lesser Eldrazi up close, steeling their stomachs for what's to come.

card.name: Ghostly Sentinel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mystics of the Stone Havens call upon the spirits of fallen heroes to defend the refuges.

card.name: Gideon, Ally of Zendikar
card.property: +1: Until end of turn, Gideon, Ally of Zendikar becomes a 5/5 Human Soldier Ally creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. 0: Create a 2/2 white Knight Ally creature token. −4: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+1."

card.name: Gideon's Reproach
card.property: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Suddenly, Gideon was there with us, clearing the way so that we could escape."—The War Diaries

card.name: Hero of Goma Fada
card.property: Rally — Whenever Hero of Goma Fada or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They seek to break us. Let us show them our strength!"

card.name: Inspired Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For the lands you have lost and the beauty that remains, for freedom and the future, we must hold nothing back!"—Gideon Jura

card.name: Kitesail Scout
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wind in one's hair, the sun on one's back, the joy of open skies . . . the next generation of kor must know this kind of peace."

card.name: Kor Bladewhirl
card.property: Rally — Whenever Kor Bladewhirl or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The high-pitched whirl of a hook is the only battle cry she needs.

card.name: Kor Castigator
card.property: Kor Castigator can't be blocked by Eldrazi Scions.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He told us not to worry, and he walked into the cavern. The swirling mass of Eldrazi parted to admit him, then closed in his wake."—Akiri, kor line-slinger

card.name: Kor Entanglers
card.property: Rally — Whenever Kor Entanglers or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We came into this world together. We fight for this world together. We'll leave this world together."

card.name: Lantern Scout
card.property: Rally — Whenever Lantern Scout or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hedron lanterns fend off more than just the darkness.

card.name: Lithomancer's Focus
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn by colorless sources.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even in the hands of amateurs, Nahiri's hedrons can harm the Eldrazi."—Ugin

card.name: Makindi Patrol
card.property: Rally — Whenever Makindi Patrol or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Working with his noble mount, he notices every form on the horizon, every scent in the air, every tremor in the earth.

card.name: Ondu Greathorn
card.property: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Ondu Greathorn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May your horns get lodged in an Eldrazi's bony face, ornery brute!"—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

card.name: Ondu Rising
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gains lifelink until end of turn. Awaken 4—{4}{W} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Planar Outburst
card.property: Destroy all nonland creatures. Awaken 4—{5}{W}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}{W}{W}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Quarantine Field
card.property: Quarantine Field enters the battlefield with X isolation counters on it. When Quarantine Field enters the battlefield, for each isolation counter on it, exile up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Quarantine Field leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Retreat to Emeria
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • Create a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token. • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Roil's Retribution
card.property: Roil's Retribution deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can use their hunger to lead them into danger. If we're already prey, we may as well be bait!"—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Serene Steward
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can give you strength, but you'll have to bring your own courage."

card.name: Shadow Glider
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A few bands of kor sought refuge from the Eldrazi in Zendikar's vast cave networks, relying on their ability to survive in harsh vertical landscapes.

card.name: Sheer Drop
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature. Awaken 3—{5}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Smite the Monstrous
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After watching the kor in battle, Gideon understood the difference between working together and working as one.

card.name: Stasis Snare
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Stasis Snare enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Stasis Snare leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

card.name: Stone Haven Medic
card.property: {W}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These days, soldiers never stick around long enough for a proper healing. They just want me to knit them up so they can hurry back to the fight."

card.name: Tandem Tactics
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

card.name: Unified Front
card.property: Converge — Create a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token for each color of mana spent to cast Unified Front.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor's pride in their independence has given way to a strong sense of community that embraces all of Zendikar.

card.name: Adverse Conditions
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Benthic Infiltrator
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) Benthic Infiltrator can't be blocked.

card.name: Cryptic Cruiser
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) {2}{U}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seas are no less imperiled than the dry lands. This fight is mine as much as it is yours."—Kiora, to Gideon Jura

card.name: Drowner of Hope
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Drowner of Hope enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool." Sacrifice an Eldrazi Scion: Tap target creature.

card.name: Eldrazi Skyspawner
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flying When Eldrazi Skyspawner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Horribly Awry
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Counter target creature spell with converted mana cost 4 or less. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are nothing but dust to them—our bodies, our actions, even our words."—Jori En, expedition leader

card.name: Incubator Drone
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Incubator Drone enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The touch of an Eldrazi brings life and death in turn.

card.name: Mist Intruder
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Flying Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wastes spread as quickly as the wind.

card.name: Murk Strider
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Murk Strider enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can see it, it's too late.

card.name: Oracle of Dust
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) {2}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whatever it is searching for, it will stop at nothing to find it.

card.name: Ruination Guide
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) Other colorless creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Salvage Drone
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) When Salvage Drone dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Spell Shrivel
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Tide Drifter
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Other colorless creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It didn't do much, but the residents of Sea Gate gave it a wide berth all the same.

card.name: Ulamog's Reclaimer
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) When Ulamog's Reclaimer enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Anticipate
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

card.name: Brilliant Spectrum
card.property: Converge — Draw X cards, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Brilliant Spectrum. Then discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are more sights on Zendikar than the eyes can see.

card.name: Cloud Manta
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Emeria's worshippers learned that she was no more than a twisted memory of Emrakul, they abandoned their temples to the god. The deserted shrines now serve as breeding grounds for the mantas.

card.name: Clutch of Currents
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Awaken 3—{4}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Coastal Discovery
card.property: Draw two cards. Awaken 4—{5}{U} (If you cast this spell for {5}{U}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Coralhelm Guide
card.property: {4} {U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."—Jori En, expedition leader

card.name: Dampening Pulse
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quiet now, you dreadful vermin."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage

card.name: Dispel
card.property: Counter target instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I said we should destroy the Eldrazi. Ugin wanted to return them to stasis. Ugin's arguments were . . . unconvincing."—Jace Beleren

card.name: Exert Influence
card.property: Converge — Gain control of target creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast Exert Influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't control its mind—I'm not even sure it has one. But I can dominate its will."

card.name: Guardian of Tazeem
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls. If that land is an Island, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Halimar Tidecaller
card.property: When Halimar Tidecaller enters the battlefield, you may return target card with awaken from your graveyard to your hand. Land creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quiet the waves? Why would I want to do that?"

card.name: Part the Waterveil
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Part the Waterveil. Awaken 6—{6}{U}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for {6}{U}{U}{U}, also put six +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

(Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Retreat to Coralhelm
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • You may tap or untap target creature. • Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.property: Converge — Creatures your opponents control get -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Roilmage's Trick. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weather on Zendikar is unpredictable—unless you're the one telling it what to do.

card.name: Rush of Ice
card.property: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Awaken 3—{4}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.property: Counter target spell. Awaken 3—{4}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Tightening Coils
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -6/-0 and loses flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having gone to the trouble of stealing a bident from a god on another world, Kiora was eager to test its capabilities.

card.name: Ugin's Insight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You speak to me of the threat of Ulamog. But do not forget: they came as three."—Ugin, to Jace Beleren

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you see? All of Tazeem strains at its tether."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem roilmage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We returned to the field and found poor Len, every detail of his final moment perfectly cast in that awful dust."—Javad Nasrin, outrider captain

card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silence rules Bala Ged, broken only by the skittering of Eldrazi.

card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.) When Dominator Drone enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Target opponent exiles a card from his or her graveyard. You create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool." Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "Let the vampires join us. In this war, we no longer have the luxury of choosing our comrades."—General Tazri, allied commander

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Defiant Bloodlord

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Despite their bravado, mortals are fragile. If Zendikar is to endure, its lords must save it."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."—Ob Nixilis

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will not live as a slave. If you would be free, then fight alongside me."

card.name: Dutiful Return

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Malakir's surgeons failed, its death-shamans took over.

card.property: {4} {B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to find their weak points, but I very much enjoy the discovery process."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time and again, I have demonstrated my skills as a healer. Why, then, are you so ill at ease?"

card.name: Kalastria Nightwatch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.

property.value: For vampires, blood carries more than life. Memories long eroded from the minds of bloodchiefs can be reclaimed from the veins of their sired kin.

property.value: As the soldiers beneath her raised their voices, the angel spread her wings, their span seeming to cover the sky.

card.name: Bring to Light
card.property: Converge — Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast Bring to Light, exile that card, then shuffle your library. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Drana's Emissary
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The taste of freedom is sweeter than blood."

card.name: Grove Rumbler
card.property: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Grove Rumbler gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land will not wait for the enemy to arrive."—Nissa Revane

card.name: Grovetender Druids
card.property: Rally — Whenever Grovetender Druids or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seedlings scream for us to loose them upon the Eldrazi, and we shall oblige."

card.name: Kiora, Master of the Depths
card.property: +1: Untap up to one target creature and up to one target land. −2: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature." Then create three 8/8 blue Octopus creature tokens.

card.name: March from the Tomb
card.property: Return any number of target Ally creature cards with total converted mana cost 8 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They came from all walks of life, from every part of Zendikar, and they returned with one unifying cause.

card.name: Munda, Ambush Leader
card.property: Haste Rally — Whenever Munda, Ambush Leader or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal any number of Ally cards from among them, then put those cards on top of your library in any order and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Noyan Dar, Roil Shaper
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. If you do, that land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste that's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After many years as a lullmage, Noyan Dar turned his talents from allaying Zendikar's fury to the considerably easier task of rousing it.

card.name: Omnath, Locus of Rage
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red and green Elemental creature token. Whenever Omnath, Locus of Rage or another Elemental you control dies, Omnath deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Resolute Blademaster
card.property: Rally — Whenever Resolute Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great steel is born in the hottest forges. Great soldiers are born in war."

card.name: Roil Spout
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Awaken 4—{4}{W}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}{U}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

card.name: Skyrider Elf
card.property: Flying Converge — Skyrider Elf enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It may be unconventional, but I'll take any steady mount in a storm."

card.name: Veteran Warleader
card.property: Veteran Warleader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Tap another untapped Ally you control: Veteran Warleader gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.

card.name: Aligned Hedron Network
card.property: When Aligned Hedron Network enters the battlefield, exile all creatures with power 5 or greater until Aligned Hedron Network leaves the battlefield. (Those creatures return under their owners' control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last hedron slotted into place, locking Ulamog in an infinite loop of binding energy.

card.name: Hedron Archive
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned.""And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

card.name: Hedron Blade
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked by one or more colorless creatures, it gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Pathway Arrows
card.property: Equipped creature has "{2}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature. If a colorless creature is dealt damage this way, tap it." Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Also called "pathway stones," hedron shards can immobilize Eldrazi on contact.

card.name: Pilgrim's Eye
card.property: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each time it is sent to find a safe haven, it takes longer to return.

card.name: Slab Hammer
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand. If you do, the creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {2}

card.name: Ally Encampment
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast an Ally spell. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Ally Encampment: Return target Ally you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Blighted Cataract
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once, water ran here. Now only dust and ash fall from the clifftops.

card.name: Blighted Fen
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We came to a place where the skin of Zendikar was peeled back and its bones lay bare to the sky."—Greenweaver Mina

card.name: Blighted Gorge

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Blighted Steppe
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Steppe: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When a limb is gangrenous, you cut it off. This is no different."—Greenweaver Mina
